contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = Lesser Grey Shrike | status = LC | status_system = IUCN3.1 | status_ref = <ref>{{IUCN|id=106005536 |title=''Lanius minor'' |assessors=[[BirdLife International]] |version=2012.1 |year=2012 |accessdate=16 July 2012}}</ref> | image = Lesser Grey Shrike by Daniel Bastaja.jpg | range_map =Lanius minor distr.png | range_map_caption = <br/>{{legend0|#FF8041|Summer|border=solid 1px black}} {{legend0|#0000FF|Winter|border=solid 1px black}} | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Bird|Aves]] | ordo = [[Passeriformes]] | familia = [[shrike|Laniidae]] | genus = ''[[Lanius]]'' | species = '''''L. minor''''' | binomial = ''Lanius minor'' | binomial_authority = [[Johann Friedrich Gmelin|Gmelin]], 1788 }} The '''Lesser Grey Shrike''' (''Lanius minor'') is a member of the [[shrike]] family ''Laniidae''. It is similar in appearance to the [[Great Grey Shrike]] ''Lanius excubitor'' and the [[Southern Grey Shrike]] ''L. meridionalis''. It breeds in southeastern [[Europe]] and into [[Asia]]. This species prefers dry open lowlands, and is prominent on telephone wires. It is slightly smaller than the Great Grey Shrike, and has a black forehead and relatively longer wings. This medium-sized [[bird migration|migratory]] [[perching bird|passerine]] eats large [[insect]]s, especially [[beetle]]s, small [[bird]]s, [[frog]]s and [[lizard]]s. Like other shrikes it hunts from prominent perches, and impales corpses on thorns or barbed wire as a "larder". It is a scarce vagrant to western Europe, including [[Great Britain]], usually as a spring overshoot. [[Image:Lesser Grey Shrike.ogg|thumb|300px|left|Riyadh, KSA, Sept 1992]] [[File:Lanius minor MHNT.ZOO.2010.11.214. Szigetesch Hongrie Balsac.jpg|thumb|''Lanius minor'' - [[MHNT]]]] <br style="clear:both"> ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{commons category|Lanius minor}} {{wikispecies|Lanius minor}} * Lesser Grey Shrike - [http://sabap2.adu.org.za/docs/sabap1/731.pdf Species text in The Atlas of Southern African Birds]. *{{field guide birds of the world|Lanius minor}} *{{avibase|8852337B06E8A14E|Lanius minor}} *[http://www.oiseaux.net/birds/photos/lesser.grey.shrike.html Oiseaux] Pictures *[http://www.ibercajalav.net/img/402_LesserGreyShrikeLminor.pdf Ageing and sexing (PDF; 0.74 MB) by Javier Blasco-Zumeta & Gerd-Michael Heinze] [[Category:Lanius]] [[Category:Birds of Europe]] [[Category:Birds of Asia]] [[Category:Birds of Azerbaijan]] [[Category:Birds of Cameroon]] {{Laniidae-stub}}
